Description: * * * NOTE: * * * Please don't message me with other offers etc. * * * NEW YEARS final price reduction: $1199 & free ship, all packed and ready to roll. This is a used 2009 Gibson Les Paul Traditional - gold top. 50s profile neck. this is a guitar I bought right here on eBay 2 months ago.. has physical flaws, dings, scratches, and bubbles in the finish, but plays and sounds GREAT. Neck straight, and frets plek'd. To be honest, I am getting old and it's a touch too heavy for me these days. that's the only reason for selling.... I will send ASAP by ground service to conus 48... no international thanks. Cosmetic Condition-Shows moderate to heavy wear with nicks, dings, scratches, checking and spots on the top body where the finish has bubbled (see photos). Free locking strap included. Neck-straight, low action, frets are in great shape with plenty of life left. Weight-11.3 pounds. Comes with the original Gibson hardshell case. It is beat and covered with stickers but still functions. One latch is broken. Two 57 Classic PAFs (57 Classic Plus in bridge position). 50s style neck profile. 24.75 inch scale length. Plek'd fretboard. TonePro/Kluson tuners with a Tone-O-Matic bridge. Unchambered. plays and sounds GREAT
Title: Gibson Les Paul Traditional Electric Guitar*2009*Goldtop*OHSC* free strap
